summary: This is a confidential lieutenant's log and daily activities report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 20, 2019. The document is part of the Jeffrey Epstein case records, likely detailing activities and observations related to his incarceration prior to his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is a log from the correctional center where he was held; he is the central figure in the case.

events.title: Daily Activities at MCC
events.description: Lieutenant's log entry detailing daily activities and operations at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a confidential daily log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
It is dated July 20, 2019, which is during the period Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there prior to his death in August 2019.
The document is marked as confidential and is part of the Southern District of New York (SDNY) case files.
